data.title: Stacey Dash Claims Husband Beat Her | Essence
data.meta_description:
Actress Stacey Dash is accusing her soon-to-be ex-husband, Emmanuel Xuereb, of domestic violence. According to TMZ, Dash, 44, filed a restraining order against Xuereb, which was originally signed by a judge on January 29. Xuereb has been ordered to stay 100 yards away from Dash, her two children and the family home. 
  
Dash claims Xuereb was violent with her a number of times--striking her in the face, head and body--during their marriage, which lasted for more than two years. 
 
    
Read More: 
 
Malaak Compton Rock Talks Domestic Abuse Rihanna Unplugged About Domestic Violence on '20/20'
data.text:
Stacey Dash Claims Husband Beat Her

Actress Stacey Dash is accusing her soon-to-be ex-husband, Emmanuel Xuereb, of domestic violence. According to TMZ, Dash, 44, filed a restraining order against Xuereb, which was originally signed by a judge on January 29. Xuereb has been ordered to stay 100 yards away from Dash, her two children and the family home. Dash claims Xuereb was violent with her a number of times--striking her in the face, head and body--during their marriage, which lasted for more than two years. Read More: Malaak Compton Rock Talks Domestic Abuse Rihanna Unplugged About Domestic Violence on '20/20'
